metadata.title: CVE-2021-47263 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:gpio: wcd934x: Fix shift-out-of-bounds errorbit-mask for pins 0 to 4 is BIT(0) to BIT(4) however we ended up with BIT(n- 1)which is not right, and this was caught by below usban checkUBSAN: shift-out-of-bounds in drivers/gpio/gpio-wcd934x.c:34:14

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
